body_html: Actually we've discussed this, and decided that since the code is exactly the same for LogSoftmax and LogSoftmax2d, we'd rather keep only the regular one. Can you just limit your changes to test/test_nn.py, but use LogSoftmax in that test case? Thanks!
body_text: Actually we've discussed this, and decided that since the code is exactly the same for LogSoftmax and LogSoftmax2d, we'd rather keep only the regular one. Can you just limit your changes to test/test_nn.py, but use LogSoftmax in that test case? Thanks!
body: Actually we've discussed this, and decided that since the code is exactly the same for `LogSoftmax` and `LogSoftmax2d`, we'd rather keep only the regular one. Can you just limit your changes to `test/test_nn.py`, but use `LogSoftmax` in that test case? Thanks!
